title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Giants firing head coach Joe Judge after only 2 seasons and why there is a specific coach that is doing well in today's NFL. He explains why the NFL continues to dominate as the most popular sport in America before the opening weekend of the playoffs. He completely disagrees with Carmelo Anthony and LeBron James claiming they are the NBA's version of the Super Bowl champion Buccaneers. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to set the record straight on which team is the greatest in NBA history.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
